specific.title: Objective of the Game
specific.description: The Beer Simulation Game places participants in the role of managers operating within a dynamic, multi-tier supply chain. By taking on one of the four industrial partners in a beer distribution network—Retailer, Wholesaler, Distributor, or Manufacturer—participants experience the realities of managing inventory, responding to demand, and making strategic decisions under uncertainty.
